short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An easy to use multi-keyword highlighter with live stats report

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Multi Highlight Hub: Elevate Your Web Highlights

Multi Highlight Hub is an easy-to-use multi-keyword highlighter with live statistical reporting.

===
Key Features:

-- Custom Styles: Tailor your highlight styles and apply them to lists of search terms.

-- Live Summary: Instantly view a summary of keywords found on the page, making it a must-have for research and analysis.

-- Fine-Tuned Control: Highlight entire words, parts of a word, or complex terms.

-- Dynamic Page Compatibility: Works seamlessly on highly dynamic pages like Facebook or Amazon without page refreshing.

-- Secure Storage: All keywords are stored in the browser's local storage.

===
Other features at a glance:

-- Create Lists: Organize your keywords into lists or groups.

-- Import/Export Lists: Conveniently transfer your keyword lists.

-- Group Management: Easily show/hide keyword groups.

-- URL Control: Whitelist or blacklist specific URLs for precise control (see options).


===
Troubleshooting Tips:

If something seems off, try toggling an item on and off or refreshing the page.

Found a bug? Report it, and we'll promptly address it to enhance your experience.
